featured.name: Michael Chen
featured.title: CEO
featured.quote: 100xBuilds transformed our lead generation completely. We went from 12 qualified leads per month to 47, and our average project value increased by 32%.

featured.name: Sarah Davidson
featured.title: President
featured.quote: Their marketing automation system freed up 15 hours per week of manual follow-up work. We're now closing 68% more prospects, and our project pipeline is booked solid.

featured.name: James Richardson
featured.title: Owner
featured.quote: The media buying strategies 100xBuilds implemented generated $2.3M in new contracts within 6 months. We've never seen ROI like this from our marketing spend.
